posts.post_content:
For sale are the following three T-206 cards. All are PSA graded and the price is net to me by PayPal F/F and includes shipping.

Peter Cassidy - PSA 2 Good condition - Sold
Bobby Byrne - PSA 2.5 Good + condition - Sold
Bud Sharpe - PSA 2.5 Good + condition - Sold

All three are Piedmont 350 backs.

First I'll take it gets priority. Ask for scans if needed, by including your e-mail address.

Thanks,

Bill
